DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics single ascend dose ASP0456 non-elderly healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Pharmacokinetics Study ASP0456 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy , judge investigator/subinvestigator base result physical examination test obtain Body weight ( screen ) ; ≥50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg BMI ( screen ) : ≥17.6 , < 26.4 Received investigational drug clinical postmarketing study within 120 day study Donated 400 mL whole blood within 90 day , 200 mL whole blood within 30 day , blood component within 14 day study Received medication within 10 day dose administer schedule receive medication History drug allergy Upper ( e.g . nausea , vomit , stomachache ) low ( e.g . abdominal pain ) gastrointestinal disease within 7 day study Concurrent previous hepatic disease Concurrent previous heart disease Concurrent previous renal disease
